about_the_game:
Capture surreal, photorealistic pictures as you explore a strange, abstract world in this relaxing art-game experience that combines minimalist game design with cutting-edge technology.
The photos you take are transformed into lifelike images by utilising NVIDIA's GauGAN2 machine learning, it only takes a few seconds to see the results.

Save, edit, and share your favourite photos as a souvenir of your journey!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 or 11
  • Processor: x86, x64
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 400 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“I found myself engrossed in anticipating how the game would interpret the environment I was exploring, and the tension between what I saw and what the AI saw. A simple geometric shape that might have been a rocky outcrop became a village in the photo that developed — and each new discovery only deepened my curiosity and sense of wonder. It’s just brilliant.”
SUPERJUMP
short_description: Capture surreal AI-generated photos exploring a strange environment with your camera in this relaxing, experiential art-game.
